Title: Requires recommendation of blood lead level screenings when a health care provider finds high lead levels in blood of a child
Summary: Requires the recommendation to a parent for blood lead level screenings of their child when a health care provider finds high lead levels in the blood of such child; directs the department of health to conduct an environmental investigation when a child is found to have high levels of lead in their blood.
LawCode: Amd ยง1370-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to screening for lead poisoning in children
